sentence: https://t.co/gIRV6zw7XO — Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) January 21, 2022 Intel has multiple factories in the U.S. already, including in Oregon, New Mexico, and Arizona.
author: Lucas Nolan
title: ‘Silicon Heartland:’ Intel Chooses Ohio to Build Largest Chip Factory ‘on the Planet’

sentence: Career politician Josh Mandel called investment banker Mike Gibbons a “p---y” under his breath at the end of the heated exchange.
author: Joseph Wilkinson
title: Republican Ohio Senate candidate calls opponent ‘p---y’ in near-altercation at debate

sentence: The debate became intense almost as soon as it began as former state Treasurer Josh Mandel attacked investment banker Mike Gibbons’ business dealings.
author: Associated Press
title: Fight at Ohio GOP Senate debate elevates military issue

sentence: An Ohio Republican Senate Candidate’s debate in Gahanna on Friday night turned confrontational between candidates Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons.
author: Pam Cook
title: Mandel and Gibbons go Toe to Toe, Nose to Nose, during Debate Friday

sentence: Ohio GOP Senate candidates Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons, who made headlines over the weekend after squaring off toe-to-toe during a party debate near Columbus, did not appear ready to back down during interviews on Newsmax Monday.
author: Sandy Fitzgerald
title: Ohio's Mandel, Gibbons to Newsmax: Not Backing Down After Debate Fight
